author: Paul Blest, VICE News
title: Amazon Fired the Warehouse Worker Who Organized a Walkout Over Coronavirus
description: “It’s not gonna stop me,” Chris Smalls said. “I’m gonna continue to fight.”
content: After he helped organize some of his fellow workers to walk out at an Amazon warehouse on Staten Island over coronavirus-related safety concerns, Chris Smalls was fired from his job. Amazon says he violated a company order to self-quarantine and put his fello… [+5124 chars]
